characters.name: Hannah Abbott
characters.description: Hufflepuff student in Harry Potter's year. Prefect and member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Aragog
characters.description: Giant spider raised by Rubeus Hagrid and lived in the Forbidden Forest.

characters.name: Ludo Bagman
characters.description: Head of the Department of Magical Games and Sports within the Ministry of Magic.

characters.name: Bathilda Bagshot
characters.description: Author of A History of Magic, and the great aunt of Gellert Grindelwald.

characters.name: Katie Bell
characters.description: Gryffindor Quidditch Chaser one year above Harry Potter. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Cuthbert Binns
characters.description: ghost, History of Magic professor.

characters.name: Phineas Nigellus Black
characters.description: Great-great-grandfather of Sirius Black and former Hogwarts headmaster. His painting hangs in the office and assists the current headmaster.

characters.name: Sirius Black
characters.description: Harry's godfather who was a close friend of Harry's father James. Escapee from Azkaban prison and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed in the Battle of the Department of Mysteries by his cousin Bellatrix Lestrange.

characters.name: Walburga Black
characters.description: Mother of Sirius and Regulus Black. Her portrait hangs in Number 12, Grimmauld Place.

characters.name: Amelia Bones
characters.description: Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, and the aunt of Susan Bones. Killed by Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Susan Bones
characters.description: Hufflepuff student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Terry Boot
characters.description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Lavender Brown
characters.description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year and member of Dumbledore's Army. Killed in the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Millicent Bulstrode
characters.description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Member of Dolores Umbridge's Inquisitorial Squad.

characters.name: Charity Burbage
characters.description: Professor of Muggle Studies at Hogwarts. Killed by Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Frank Bryce
characters.description: Muggle gardener for the Riddle family. Killed by Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Bane
characters.description: Centaur, not very wizard-friendly.

characters.name: Beedle the Bard
characters.description: Author of several wizarding fairy tales including The Tale of the Three Brothers.

characters.name: The Bloody Baron
characters.description: Slytherin House ghost. Suitor of Helena Ravenclaw before killing her in a fit of blind rage, then commits suicide in remorse.

characters.name: Bogrod
characters.description: Head goblin at Gringotts Wizarding Bank. Put under the Imperius curse when Harry, Ron, and Hermione break into Gringotts.

characters.name: Buckbeak
characters.description: Hippogriff belonging at various times to Hagrid, Sirius Black and Harry Potter.

characters.name: Alecto Carrow
characters.description: Death Eater and sister of Amycus Carrow. Professor of Muggle Studies for one year, and Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts under Severus Snape.

characters.name: Amycus Carrow
characters.description: Death Eater and brother of Alecto Carrow. Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts for one year, and Deputy Headmaster of Hogwarts under Snape.

characters.name: Reginald Cattermole
characters.description: Employee of the Magical Maintenance Department for the Ministry of Magic. Impersonated by Ron Weasley.

characters.name: Mary Cattermole
characters.description: Muggle-born wife of Reginald Cattermole. Saved by Harry Potter from the Muggle-born Registration Commission.

characters.name: Cho Chang
characters.description: Ravenclaw Quidditch Seeker one year above Harry, and his first love interest. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Penelope Clearwater
characters.description: Ravenclaw prefect and girlfriend of Percy Weasley.

characters.name: Mrs. Cole
characters.description: Matron of the orphanage where Tom Riddle lived.

characters.name: Michael Corner
characters.description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Crabbe
characters.description: Death Eater and father of Vincent Crabbe.

characters.name: Vincent Crabbe
characters.description: Slytherin student in Harry's year and the son of a Death Eater. Slytherin Quidditch Beater and member of the Inquisitorial Squad. Killed by his own Fiendfyre spell.

characters.name: Colin Creevey
characters.description: Muggle-born Gryffindor student one year below Harry. Older brother of Dennis Creevey, and member of Dumbledore's Army. Killed during the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Dennis Creevey
characters.description: Muggle-born Gryffindor student three years below Harry. Younger brother of Colin Creevey, and member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Dirk Cresswell
characters.description: Muggle-born Head of the Goblin Liaison Office, went on the run with fellow Muggle-borns Ted Tonks, Dean Thomas and goblins Gornuk and Griphook, during which he is killed.

characters.name: Barty Crouch Sr
characters.description: Head of the Department of International Magical Cooperation. Killed by his son Barty Crouch Jr.

characters.name: Barty Crouch Jr
characters.description: Death Eater credited with facilitating the return of Lord Voldemort. Used Polyjuice Potion to impersonate Alastor Moody, and received a Dementor's Kiss.

characters.name: Sir Cadogan
characters.description: Armored and somewhat mad knight occupying a painting in Hogwarts.

characters.name: Crookshanks
characters.description: Intelligent cat belonging to Hermione Granger.

characters.name: Roger Davies
characters.description: Ravenclaw Quidditch Captain and Chaser. Attended Yule Ball with Fleur Delacour.

characters.name: John Dawlish
characters.description: an Auror.

characters.name: Fleur Delacour
characters.description: Participant in the Triwizard Tournament as a representative of wizarding school Beauxbatons. Later married Bill Weasley.

characters.name: Gabrielle Delacour
characters.description: Fleur's younger sister. Rescued by Harry during the Triwizard Tournament.

characters.name: Dedalus Diggle
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix who took the Dursleys into hiding.

characters.name: Amos Diggory
characters.description: Cedric Diggory's father. Employee of the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures.

characters.name: Cedric Diggory
characters.description: Hufflepuff student and prefect two years above Harry. Quidditch Seeker and captain, and co-winner of the Triwizard Tournament. Killed by Peter Pettigrew on Lord Voldemort's command.

characters.name: Elphias Doge
characters.description: School friend of Albus Dumbledore.

characters.name: Antonin Dolohov
characters.description: Death Eater who killed Fabian Prewett, Gideon Prewett, and Remus Lupin.

characters.name: Aberforth Dumbledore
characters.description: Brother of Albus and Ariana Dumbledore. Owner of the Hog's Head tavern.

characters.name: Albus Dumbledore
characters.description: Transfiguration professor in Tom Riddle's time, and Hogwarts headmaster in Harry Potter's time. Founder of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed by Severus Snape on Dumbledore's request.

characters.name: Ariana Dumbledore
characters.description: Sister of Albus and Aberforth Dumbledore, killed in three-way duel between her brothers and Gellert Grindelwald.

characters.name: Kendra Dumbledore
characters.description: Wife of Percival Dumbledore. Mother of Albus, Aberforth and Ariana Dumbledore.

characters.name: Percival Dumbledore
characters.description: Husband of Kendra Dumbledore, father of Albus, Aberforth and Ariana Dumbledore.

characters.name: Dudley Dursley
characters.description: Muggle son of Vernon Dursley and Petunia Evans, first cousin of Harry Potter.

characters.name: Marge Dursley
characters.description: Muggle sister of Vernon Dursley.

characters.name: Petunia Dursley
characters.description: Harry's aunt, and his mother Lily's sister. Vernon's wife and Dudley's mother.

characters.name: Vernon Dursley
characters.description: Harry Potter's Muggle uncle. Petunia's husband and Dudley's father.

characters.name: Dobby
characters.description: House-elf originally belonging to the Malfoy family until he is set free by Harry in Chamber of Secrets.

characters.name: Marietta Edgecombe
characters.description: Ravenclaw student one year above Harry. Member of Dumbledore's Army who later betrays the group to Dolores Umbridge.

characters.name: Errol
characters.description: Owl belonging to the Weasley family.

characters.name: Arabella Figg
characters.description: Squib neighbor of the Dursleys. Member of the Order of the Phoenix.

characters.name: Argus Filch
characters.description: Squib caretaker of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Justin Finch-Fletchley
characters.description: Muggle-born Hufflepuff student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Seamus Finnigan
characters.description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army and best friend of housemate Dean Thomas.

characters.name: Marcus Flint
characters.description: Slytherin Quidditch captain.

characters.name: Mundungus Fletcher
characters.description: Common thief and shifty Order of the Phoenix member.

characters.name: Filius Flitwick
characters.description: Head of Ravenclaw House and Charms professor at Hogwarts.

characters.name: Florean Fortescue
characters.description: Ice cream vendor at Diagon Alley.

characters.name: Cornelius Fudge
characters.description: Minister for Magic in the first five books. Sacked after persistently denying Lord Voldemort's return.

characters.name: Fang
characters.description: Hagrid's pet boarhound.

characters.name: The Fat Friar
characters.description: Hufflepuff House ghost.

characters.name: The Fat Lady
characters.description: Witch in the painting concealing the entrance to the Gryffindor common room.

characters.name: Fawkes
characters.description: Phoenix belonging to Albus Dumbledore. Saved Harry Potter from the Basilisk inside the Chamber of Secrets.

characters.name: Firenze
characters.description: Centaur and substitute Divination professor at Hogwarts during Harry's fifth year.

characters.name: Fluffy
characters.description: Three-headed dog belonging to Hagrid and protector of the Philosopher's Stone.

characters.name: Marvolo Gaunt
characters.description: The pure-blood father of Merope and Morfin Gaunt, and grandfather of Tom Marvolo Riddle.

characters.name: Merope Gaunt
characters.description: Tom Riddle's mother who died in childbirth.

characters.name: Morfin Gaunt
characters.description: Marvolo's son and Merope's brother. Framed by his nephew Tom Riddle for Muggle killings, and died in Azkaban.

characters.name: Anthony Goldstein
characters.description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Goyle
characters.description: Death Eater and father of Gregory Goyle.

characters.name: Gregory Goyle
characters.description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Slytherin Quidditch Beater and member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: Muggle-born Gryffindor student in Harry's year and one of his best friends. Prefect and co-founder of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Astoria Greengrass
characters.description: Draco Malfoy's wife. She died in 2019 due to her blood curse.

characters.name: Gregorovitch
characters.description: highly regarded Eastern European wandmaker.

characters.name: Fenrir Greyback
characters.description: Werewolf working for the Death Eaters.

characters.name: Gellert Grindelwald
characters.description: Dark wizard who was jailed after Albus Dumbledore defeated him in the 1940s.

characters.name: Wilhelmina Grubbly-Plank
characters.description: Substitute Care of Magical Creatures professor during Harry's fourth and fifth years.

characters.name: Godric Gryffindor
characters.description: One of the four founders of Hogwarts. He was a very powerful wizard.

characters.name: Gornuk
characters.description: Gringotts goblin who goes on the run from Death Eaters in Deathly Hallows along with fellow goblin Griphook, plus Dean Thomas, Ted Tonks, and Dirk Cresswell.

characters.name: Grawp
characters.description: Giant and Hagrid's half-brother.

characters.name: Griphook
characters.description: Gringotts Bank goblin who helps Harry and his friends steal Helga Hufflepuff's cup from within the Lestrange vault.

characters.name: Rubeus Hagrid
characters.description: Half-giant Hogwarts gamekeeper, and Care of Magical Creatures professor starting in Harry's third year. Member of the Order of the Phoenix. As a Hogwarts student, he was expelled in his third year.

characters.name: Rolanda Hooch
characters.description: Hogwarts flying instructor and Quidditch referee.

characters.name: Mafalda Hopkirk
characters.description: Witch who works in the Ministry of Magic. Impersonated by Hermione Granger.

characters.name: Helga Hufflepuff
characters.description: Founder of Hufflepuff House. Co

characters.name: Hedwig
characters.description: Harry Potter's pet owl. Killed during the Battle of the Seven Potters.

characters.name: Hokey
characters.description: House-elf belonging to Hepzibah Smith.

characters.name: Angelina Johnson
characters.description: Gryffindor student two years above Harry. Quidditch Chaser and later team captain.

characters.name: Lee Jordan
characters.description: Gryffindor student two years above Harry. Hogwarts Quidditch commentator and good friend of Fred and George Weasley.

characters.name: Kreacher
characters.description: House-elf belonging to the Black family and later Harry Potter. Though at first preferring to serve the pureblood line (including Regulus Black, Narcissa Malfoy, Bellatrix Lestrange, and Draco Malfoy), he eventually prefers serving under Harry as he treats him better.

characters.name: Igor Karkaroff
characters.description: Reformed Death Eater. Headmaster of wizarding school Durmstrang.

characters.name: Viktor Krum
characters.description: Bulgarian Quidditch Seeker and Durmstrang student who participated in the Triwizard Tournament.

characters.name: Silvanus Kettleburn
characters.description: Care of Magical Creatures teacher until Harry's third year.

characters.name: Magorian
characters.description: A centaur.

characters.name: Great Aunt Muriel
characters.description: The Weasley children's great-aunt.

characters.name: Bellatrix Lestrange
characters.description: Cousin of Sirius Black. Death Eater who tortured Neville Longbottom's parents Frank and Alice into insanity. Killed by Molly Weasley during the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Rabastan Lestrange
characters.description: Death Eater. Brother of Rodolphus Lestrange.

characters.name: Rodolphus Lestrange
characters.description: Death Eater. Bellatrix's husband and Rabastan's brother.

characters.name: Gilderoy Lockhart
characters.description: Fraudulent celebrity author and Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher. Lost his memory after a memory charm backfired and resided in St. Mungo's afterwards.

characters.name: Alice and Frank Longbottom
characters.description: Neville Longbottom's parents. Aurors and members of the original Order of the Phoenix. Tortured into insanity by Bellatrix Lestrange.

characters.name: Augusta Longbottom
characters.description: Frank's mother and Neville's grandmother, who raises him after his parents are incapacitated.

characters.name: Neville Longbottom
characters.description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Luna Lovegood
characters.description: Xenophilius Lovegood's daughter and Ravenclaw student one year below Harry. Member of Dumbledore's Army and wife of Newt Scamander's grandson Rolf.

characters.name: Xenophilius Lovegood
characters.description: Luna's father. Editor of tabloid magazine The Quibbler.

characters.name: Remus Lupin
characters.description: Lycanthropic Gryffindor student before Harry's time who befriended Sirius Black and James Potter. Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts in Harry's third year, and member of the Order of the Phoenix. He and his wife Nymphadora Tonks gave birth to a son, Teddy, before dying in the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Teddy Lupin
characters.description: Son of Remus Lupin and Nymphadora Tonks, and Harry's godson.

characters.name: Nagini
characters.description: Lord Voldemort's massive pet snake that does his bidding. She is one of Voldemort's Horcruxes who is ultimately slain by Neville Longbottom during the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Nearly Headless Nick
characters.description: Gryffindor house ghost. Full name is Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington.

characters.name: Norbert
characters.description: A baby dragon illegally owned by Hagrid who is relocated to a reserve in Romania by friends of Ron's older brother Charlie Weasley.

characters.name: Walden Macnair
characters.description: Death Eater and Committee of Disposal of Dangerous Creatures' executioner. Injured badly by Hagrid during the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Draco Malfoy
characters.description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Quidditch Seeker, prefect, and member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

characters.name: Lucius Malfoy
characters.description: Draco's father and an influential Death Eater. Governor of Hogwarts early in the series.

characters.name: Narcissa Malfoy
characters.description: Lucius' wife and Draco's mother. Sister of Bellatrix Lestrange and Andromeda Tonks.

characters.name: Scorpius Malfoy
characters.description: Son of Draco Malfoy and Astoria Greengrass. Sorted into Slytherin. Friends with Albus Potter.

characters.name: Madam Malkin
characters.description: Clothing shop owner in Diagon Alley.

characters.name: Griselda Marchbanks
characters.description: Governor of the Wizarding Examinations Authority which ran the O.W.L, N.E.W.T., and W.O.M.B.A.T. exams. Wizengamot elder.

characters.name: Olympe Maxime
characters.description: Half-giantess. Headmistress of Beauxbatons.

characters.name: Ernie Macmillan
characters.description: Hufflepuff student in Harry's year. Prefect and member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Minerva McGonagall
characters.description: Hogwarts Transfiguration professor, Head of Gryffindor House, Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts, and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Assumes position of Hogwarts Headmaster for a time after Voldemort's death.

characters.name: Cormac McLaggen
characters.description: Gryffindor student one year above Harry Potter. Quidditch Keeper and member of Horace Slughorn's Slug Club.

characters.name: Graham Montague
characters.description: Slytherin Quidditch Chaser who became trapped inside a Vanishing Cabinet for six months.

characters.name: Alastor (Mad-Eye) Moody
characters.description: Retired Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Impersonated by Barty Crouch Jr. in his scheme to enter Harry into the Triwizard Tournament. Killed by Voldemort.

characters.name: Peeves
characters.description: Hogwarts poltergeist, a mischievous magical being.

characters.name: Pigwidgeon
characters.description: A tiny mischievous owl belonging to Ron Weasley. Called "Pig" for short.

characters.name: Theodore Nott
characters.description: Slytherin student in the same year as Harry Potter, and son of a Death Eater.

characters.name: Nott Sr
characters.description: Theodore Nott's father. Death Eater.

characters.name: Madam Rosmerta
characters.description: Proprietor of The Three Broomsticks inn in Hogsmeade village.

characters.name: Ronan
characters.description: A centaur living in the Forbidden Forest.

characters.name: Bob Ogden
characters.description: Leader of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement Squad in the 1920s. Turned the Gaunt family over to the Wizengamot for using magic in front of a Muggle. Died before Harry Potter's sixth year.

characters.name: Garrick Ollivander
characters.description: Wandmaker and owner of the Ollivanders wand shop. Kidnapped by the Malfoy family for several months until freed by Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

characters.name: Scabbers
characters.description: Ron Weasley's pet rat in the first three stories who is revealed to be a wizard in animal form: Peter Pettigrew.

characters.name: Scabior
characters.description: Snatcher who captures Harry, Ron and Hermione in Deathly Hallows.

characters.name: Pansy Parkinson
characters.description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Prefect and member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

characters.name: Padma Patil
characters.description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Identical twin sister of Gryffindor student Parvati Patil, and a member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Parvati Patil
characters.description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year and Padma's identical twin sister. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Peter Pettigrew
characters.description: Death Eater and former school friend of James Potter, Sirius Black and Remus Lupin. Betrays Harry's parents James and Lily Potter to Voldemort, resulting in their deaths. Pettigrew is first introduced in the series as Ron Weasley's pet rat Scabbers. He is strangled to death by his own metal prosthetic hand after his loyalty towards Voldemort wavers upon Harry confronting him about having previously spared Pettigrew's life.

characters.name: Antioch, Cadmus, and Ignotus Peverell
characters.description: Three brothers who were the original owners of the Elder Wand, the Resurrection Stone, and the Invisibility Cloak, respectively.

characters.name: Irma Pince
characters.description: Hogwarts librarian.

characters.name: Sturgis Podmore
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix.

characters.name: Poppy Pomfrey
characters.description: Hogwarts school nurse.

characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: The main character of the series. Orphaned son of James and Lily Potter. Gryffindor student at Hogwarts, and co-founder and first leader of Dumbledore's Army. The husband of Ginny Weasley, father of James Sirius, Albus Severus and Lily Luna Potter.

characters.name: James Potter
characters.description: Harry Potter's father and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed along with his wife Lily by Lord Voldemort prior to the start of the series.

characters.name: Lily Potter
characters.description: Harry Potter's mother and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed by Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Albus Severus Potter
characters.description: Second child of Harry Potter and Ginny Weasley.

characters.name: James Sirius Potter
characters.description: Harry and Ginny's first child.

characters.name: Lily Luna Potter
characters.description: Harry and Ginny's third child.

characters.name: Travers
characters.description: Wizard and Death Eater who escapes from Azkaban after Lord Voldemort's return.

characters.name: Trevor
characters.description: Neville Longbottom's perpetually-misplaced pet toad.

characters.name: Quirinus Quirrell
characters.description: Defence Against the Dark Arts professor in Harry Potter's first year. Possessed by Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Winky
characters.description: A female house-elf who belonged to Barty Crouch Sr until he sacked her, then worked in the Hogwarts kitchen.

characters.name: Helena Ravenclaw/The Grey Lady
characters.description: Daughter of house founder Rowena Ravenclaw. Stole and hid her mother's diadem, and became Ravenclaw's house ghost after being killed by the Bloody Baron.

characters.name: Rowena Ravenclaw
characters.description: One of the four founders of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, and founder of the Ravenclaw house.

characters.name: Mary Riddle
characters.description: Thomas Riddle Sr.'s Muggle wife, and Thomas Riddle Jr.'s mother. Killed by her grandson, Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Thomas Riddle Sr.
characters.description: Mary's Muggle husband and Thomas Riddle Jr.'s father. Killed by Voldemort.

characters.name: Thomas Riddle Jr.
characters.description: Voldemort's Muggle father and Merope Gaunt's husband. Killed by his son, Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Thomas Marvolo Riddle
characters.description: Slytherin student who became Lord Voldemort.

characters.name: Demelza Robins
characters.description: Gryffindor student and Quidditch Chaser.

characters.name: Augustus Rookwood
characters.description: Death Eater and spy working in the Department of Mysteries.

characters.name: Thorfinn Rowle
characters.description: Death Eater.

characters.name: Albert Runcorn
characters.description: Ministry of Magic employee whose chief function was as an investigator of alleged Muggle-borns.

characters.name: Rowena Ravenclaw
characters.description: mother to Helena Ravenclaw. Co

characters.name: Newt Scamander
characters.description: Magizoologist and author of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them. Main character in the Fantastic Beasts film series. Expelled Hogwarts student who excels in curing different sicknesses.

characters.name: Rufus Scrimgeour
characters.description: Head of the Auror Office who replaces Cornelius Fudge as Minister for Magic. Killed by Death Eaters.

characters.name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
characters.description: Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Replaces Pius Thicknesse as Minister for Magic.

characters.name: Stan Shunpike
characters.description: Conductor of the triple-decker Knight Bus. Jailed in Azkaban on suspicions of being a Death Eater.

characters.name: Aurora Sinistra
characters.description: Astronomy professor at Hogwarts.

characters.name: Rita Skeeter
characters.description: Reporter and tabloid journalist for the Daily Prophet.

characters.name: Horace Slughorn
characters.description: Former Hogwarts Potions professor and Head of Slytherin House, whose charges included Tom Riddle. Returned to Hogwarts to teach Potions in Harry's sixth year.

characters.name: Salazar Slytherin
characters.description: One of the four founders of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, and founder of the Slytherin house.

characters.name: Zacharias Smith
characters.description: Hufflepuff Quidditch Chaser in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Severus Snape
characters.description: Potions and later Defence Against the Dark Arts professor at Hogwarts. Head of Slytherin House, and member of both the Death Eaters and the Order of the Phoenix as a double agent spying for Dumbledore.

characters.name: Alicia Spinnet
characters.description: Gryffindor student two years above Harry. Quidditch Chaser and member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Pomona Sprout
characters.description: Hogwarts Herbology professor and Head of Hufflepuff House.

characters.name: Pius Thicknesse
characters.description: Minister for Magic while under the Imperius Curse. Replaced by Kingsley Shacklebolt.

characters.name: Dean Thomas
characters.description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Andromeda Tonks
characters.description: Sister of Bellatrix Lestrange and Narcissa Malfoy, and the mother of Nymphadora Tonks. Disowned by her family for marrying Muggle-born Ted Tonks.

characters.name: Nymphadora Tonks
characters.description: Ted and Andromeda's daughter. Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. She marries Remus Lupin and becomes the mother of a son, Teddy, before she and Remus are killed in the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Ted Tonks
characters.description: Andromeda's Muggle-born husband, and the father of Nymphadora Tonks. Killed by Snatchers.

characters.name: Sybill Trelawney
characters.description: Hogwarts Divination professor. Predicted the prophecy that prompted Lord Voldemort to go after the Potters.

characters.name: Wilkie Twycross
characters.description: Hogwarts Apparition instructor who works in the Department of Magical Transportation.

characters.name: Dolores Umbridge
characters.description: Senior Undersecretary to the Minister for Magic, Hogwarts High Inquisitor and temporary Headmistress of Hogwarts. She becomes Defence Against the Dark Arts professor in Harry Potter's fifth year, and joins in the persecution of half-bloods and Muggle-borns under Voldemort. Sentenced to life imprisonment in Azkaban.

characters.name: Emmeline Vance
characters.description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed by Death Eaters.

characters.name: Romilda Vane
characters.description: Gryffindor student who unsuccessfully tries to romance Harry.

characters.name: Septima Vector
characters.description: Arithmancy professor at Hogwarts.

characters.name: Lord Voldemort (Tom Marvolo Riddle)
characters.description: The villain of the series. Murderer of Harry Potter's parents and many others in his quest for immortality and absolute power.

characters.name: Myrtle Warren/Moaning Myrtle
characters.description: Muggle-born Ravenclaw student during Tom Riddle's time at Hogwarts. Killed by the Basilisk in a girls' bathroom, which she continued to haunt after her death.

characters.name: Arthur Weasley
characters.description: Muggle-obsessed Ministry of Magic employee, and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Husband of Molly Weasley, father of Bill, Charlie, Percy, Fred, George, Ron, and Ginny Weasley.

characters.name: Bill Weasley
characters.description: Oldest son of Arthur and Molly Weasley, and Gringotts employee. Marries Fleur Delacour.

characters.name: Charlie Weasley
characters.description: Second son of Arthur and Molly Weasley. Member of the Order of the Phoenix. Works with dragons in Romania.

characters.name: Fred Weasley
characters.description: Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley and identical twin brother of George Weasley. Gryffindor Quidditch Beater and member of Dumbledore's Army, later co-owner of joke shop Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes. Killed in the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: George Weasley
characters.description: Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley and identical twin brother of Fred Weasley. Gryffindor Quidditch Beater and member of Dumbledore's Army. Co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.

characters.name: Ginny Weasley
characters.description: Only daughter and youngest child of Arthur and Molly Weasley. Gryffindor student one year below Harry, Quidditch Seeker and Chaser, and member of Dumbledore's Army. Wife of Harry Potter.

characters.name: Hugo Weasley
characters.description: Son of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger, brother of Rose Weasley.

characters.name: Molly Weasley
characters.description: Wife of Arthur Weasley and mother of Bill, Charlie, Percy, Fred, George, Ron, and Ginny. Member of the Order of the Phoenix.

characters.name: Percy Weasley
characters.description: Third son of Arthur and Molly Weasley. Gryffindor prefect and Head Boy, then Ministry of Magic employee, during which he becomes estranged from his family before joining them in fighting the Death Eaters in the Battle of Hogwarts.

characters.name: Ron Weasley
characters.description: Youngest son of Arthur and Molly Weasley who is best friends with Harry Potter and Hermione Granger. Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper, prefect, and co-founder of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Oliver Wood
characters.description: Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper and captain four years above Harry.

characters.name: Rose Weasley
characters.description: Daughter of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger. Sister of Hugo Weasley.

characters.name: Corban Yaxley
characters.description: Death Eater. Head of Magical Law Enforcement under Voldemort's regime.

characters.name: Blaise Zabini
characters.description: Slytherin student in Harry's year.
